needing admission who screen negative
for COVID-19 symptoms and who can provide evidence that they are fully vaccinated against COVID-19 do not
need a COVID-19 admission test and can be managed as COVID -19 negative. They must be screened daily
for COVID-19 symptoms.
Symptoms of COVID-19 present Symptoms of COVID-19 absent 
COVID-19 rapid antigen test positive Admit to designated COVID-19 section of the 
maternity unit at the appropriate level of care
